title: Elon Musk merges SpaceX, xAI to build space data centers. What to know
description: Elon Musk is merging his SpaceX rocket company with his artificial intelligence startup xAI. The deal is valued at $1.25 trillion.
content:
Elon Musk is merging his rocket company SpaceX with his artificial intelligence startup xAI.
The merger is part of Musk's long-term plan to build data centers in space.

title: U.S. software stocks hit by Anthropic wake-up call
description: U.S. software stocks extended their slide on Wednesday, driven by fears of disruption caused by artificial intelligence, with some analysts warning of more volatility as investors assess whether the challenge is existential for the sector.

title: Startup EnFi raises $15 million to deploy AI credit analyst agents at banks
description: Boston-based startup EnFi is raising $15 million with venture capital funds to increase deployment of artificial intelligence agents that analyze and make decisions on credit applications.
content:
NEW YORK, Feb 4 (Reuters) - Boston-based startup EnFi is raising $15 million with venture capital funds to increase deployment of artificial intelligence agents that analyze and make decisions on credit applications.

title: AMD predicts weaker first-quarter sales, shares plunge on Nvidia comparisons
description: ADVANCED Micro Devices on Tuesday forecast a slight decline in quarterly revenue, raising concerns about whether it can effectively challenge Nvidia in the booming artificial intelligence (AI) market and sending its shares tumbling 8 percent in after-hours trade.

title: KKR, Singtel pay $5.2 billion for full control of data center operator STT GDC
description: SINGAPORE — A KKR and Singapore Telecommunications consortium will pay SG$6.6 billion ($5.2 billion) in cash to take full control of ST Telemedia Global Data Centers (STT GDC), the companies said on Tuesday, in an intensifying race for artificial intelligence capacity.

title: Disney taps parks head Josh D'Amaro as CEO to lead post-Iger era
description: WALT Disney on Tuesday named theme parks head Josh D’Amaro as CEO, ending years of succession uncertainty and placing a longtime insider at the helm as artificial intelligence (AI) and a wave of consolidation upend the media industry.

title: AMD Posts Record Revenue As Data Center AI Demand Surges 39%
description: Big tech is currently enjoying a virtual license to print money thanks to booming artificial intelligence (AI) demand, with record earnings becoming the norm as of late, and AMD is no exception.
